∀x ((InternationalStudent(x) ∧ US(x) ∧ F1Visa(x) ∧ Work(x)) → NeedsToApply(x, CPT()) ∨ NeedsToApply(x, OPT())) ::: An international student in the US with an F1 visa needs to apply for CPT or OPT if the student wants to work in the US.
∀x (InternationalStudent(x) ∧ US(x) ∧ Work(x) → NeedsToApply(x, CPT())) ::: If an international student in the US wants to work, they need to apply for CPT.

# Conclusion:
J1Visa(mike)
